issue.title: Build a Book Library System
issue.body:
## Book Library Management System

Build a full-stack book library app with Next.js, SQLite, and Playwright tests.

## Features
- Add/edit/delete books (title, author, ISBN, year)
- List books with search
- Mark books as borrowed/returned

## Stack
- **Frontend**: Next.js 14 App Router + Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Next.js API routes
- **Database**: SQLite with better-sqlite3
- **Testing**: Playwright

## File Structure
```
app/
  layout.tsx, page.tsx
  books/[id]/page.tsx, books/new/page.tsx
  api/books/route.ts, api/books/[id]/route.ts
lib/db.ts
components/BookCard.tsx, BookForm.tsx
tests/books.spec.ts
```

## Setup Files
- package.json, tsconfig.json, tailwind.config.ts
- next.config.js, playwright.config.ts, .gitignore

ems.task: Create all project setup files including .gitignore, package.json with all dependencies (Next.js 14, better-sqlite3, Tailwind CSS, Playwright, TypeScript), tsconfig.json, next.config.js, tailwind.config.ts, playwright.config.ts, and app/layout.tsx

analysisSummary: Implement a full-stack book library management system with Next.js 14 App Router, SQLite database, and Playwright E2E testing. Features include CRUD operations for books, search functionality, and borrow/return tracking.

pendingEMs.task: Implement database layer (lib/db.ts with SQLite schema and CRUD operations) and API routes (app/api/books/route.ts for GET/POST and app/api/books/[id]/route.ts for GET/PUT/DELETE)

Build all UI components and pages: components/BookCard.tsx, components/BookForm.tsx, app/page.tsx (book list with search), app/books/new/page.tsx (add book), and app/books/[id]/page.tsx (edit book with borrow/return toggle)
Write comprehensive Playwright E2E tests in tests/books.spec.ts covering all user flows: add book, edit book, delete book, search books, and borrow/return functionality
